about: Bronzeville Scholastic Institute is a four year college preparatory high school, and part of the Chicago Public Schools network. It is located in the neighborhood of Bronzeville in Chicago, Illinois on the DuSable Campus, and shares a building with Daniel Hale Williams Preparatory School of Medicine and DuSable Leadership Academy.
